appEvents.meetingConnectionLost: Connection to the meeting has been lost
appEvents.meetingJoinFailed: An error occurred while joining the meeting
appEvents.numberNotAllowed: Calling {{ phoneNumber }} is not allowed at this time

appStatus.checkTvConnection: Please make sure the associated {{ productName }} TV is currently running and connected to the Internet.
appStatus.exitElectronConfirm: Are you sure you would like to exit {{ productName }}?
appStatus.noPermanentRemoteShare: Sharing is not possible with this remote. Please reset the deployment URL.
appStatus.tvConflict: An instance of this room is already open. Please close all other instances.
appStatus.tvNotSupported: Hosting {{ productName }} is not supported on the current browser.
appStatus.useChrome: Please open {{ productName }} on Chrome desktop.
appStatus.waitingForTv: Waiting for {{ productName }} TV to connect.

calendar.inviteThisRoom: Invite this room to your calendar event and you'll be set.
calendar.retrySync: Please try reconnecting to the room's calendar.
calendar.setupHow: Pair your remote and connect your calendar.

conferenceStatus.exitingConference: The conference will be exited automatically in
conferenceStatus.howToEnterPassword: You can use the remote control device to submit a password.
conferenceStatus.kicked: You have been removed from the conference.
conferenceStatus.slowJoin: The conference is taking a while to join. Cancel?
conferenceStatus.waitingForStart: Currently waiting for the conference to start.

feedback.details: Please tell us more about it.
feedback.howTo: You can use the remote control device to submit feedback now.

hangup.confirmation: Are you sure you want to hang up?

help.howToConnect: Open {{ url }} in a desktop Google Chrome browser in the conference room to set it up and obtain a share key. Next enter the {{ codeLength }}-character share key in this app.
help.isRemote: This app is a remote controller for a conference room.

join.visibleAt: Your key is visible on the {{ productName }} TV

recording.understand: I understand, keep me muted for now
recording.inProgressDescription: This meeting is being recorded and analyzed by AI. Your audio and video have been muted. If you choose to unmute, you consent to being recorded.

screenshare.alreadyActive: Cannot start wireless screenshare while screenshare is active.
screenshare.controlRoom: Use your computer to control the meeting room
screenshare.howToStop: You can stop screen sharing below.
screenshare.howToWireless: To share, use Chrome desktop and go to
screenshare.notSupported: This browser is currently not supported. To share content please use Chrome.
screenshare.notSupportedMeetingType: Screensharing is not supported while in {{ type }} meetings
screenshare.pick: How would you like to screenshare?
screenshare.plugWired: Plug the HDMI dongle into your computer
screenshare.startManual: If sharing doesn't start automatically click start sharing below.
screenshare.stopWired: To stop sharing content unplug the cable or click stop sharing.

setup.enterCode: Enter your pairing code and start your setup
setup.enterName: Enter an email or room name (case-sensitive)
setup.name: Enter room display name
setup.pairAsk: Would you like to pair a permanent remote control with this room?
